docblock.description: This class detects the differences between two version of the map.
When an entry has no change.
When an entry is a new one.
When an entry has been removed.
When an entry has its coordinates and its data modified.
When an entry has its coordinates modified.
When an entry has its data modified.
When an entry has potentially a data loss.
The changes detected in the diff process.
The maximum ID of the reference.
docblock.long-description: This is used to know if the deleted marker has really been deleted or the deletion detection comes from the fact that the modification has been made from an older reference than the current one.

docblock.description: Process the DIFF between the modification and the reference config.
docblock.long-description: This populates the $changes attribute with markers and information about the change.

tag.name: todo
tag.description: adding more comments for the algorithm

tag.name: return
tag.description: $changes with all the changes from the diff

docblock.description: Looks for a marker in the reference and build the entry result.
Search for a marker in the modification JSON array.
docblock.long-description: We delete the found item from the modification JSON array each time we find it. In the end, the remaining items are the added ones.

tag.description: the marker type from the reference

tag.name: return
tag.description: array that represents the result with the status and eventually the marker or/and the marker from the reference
